name: "All My Children"  2008 Online Trivia | 'All My Children'- Year Specific Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who unknowingly gave his bone marrow to Richie Novak for his transplant?
questions.explanation:
JR.

	Richie Novak was Annie Lavery's no good con artist brother who showed up in 2007.  He had a rare form of leukemia that could be treated with a bone marrow transplant.  Oddly, enough JR Chandler ended up being an exact match.  While JR was on his way to donate the bone marrow, Richie's thugs kidnapped him and drugged him so that a shady doctor could perform the transplant.

questions.text: What was the name of the brash senatorial candidate who ruffled Erica Kane's feathers?
questions.explanation:
Samuel Woods.

	Samuel Woods came to Pine Valley to investigate the illegal stock purchasing made by Erica Kane.  Erica fooled him but pleading guilty and receiving her sentence so that he could not profit from the publicity during his campaign.

questions.text: What nickname did Carmen refer to Erica as during their time on the run and in prison?
questions.explanation:
Superstar.

	Carmen met Erica at Erica's first trial for insider trading.  The two were transported to a minimum security facility and due to an accident went on the run.  Erica strove to make sure that when they got to prison Carmen would be acquitted of her wrongful imprisonment for bank robbery.

questions.text: Tad finally learned that Kathy is really Kate Martin, his long lost daughter with Dixie.
questions.explanation:
True.

	For the last 1 1/2 years the viewers had been teased several times that Tad will finally learn that Kathy, Julia's adopted daughter, is actually Kate Martin.

questions.text: After Ryan Lavery lost his memory, what year did he feel like he was stuck in?
questions.explanation:
2004.

	Ryan woke up one morning and looked at Annie and said "Who are you"?  She of course thought he was joking.  Ryan had lost the last four years of his life and thought that it was still 2004 when he was about to marry Kendall.

questions.text: Which superstar couple of the 1980s "All My Children" made a comeback in January of 2008?
questions.explanation:
Jessie and Angie.

	In January 2008 Jesse Hubbard showed up concerned over his ill son, Frankie.  Jesse had been gone from Pine Valley for 20 years and had been on the run in fear of his family's safety.  Once he returned and Angie discovered he was alive, she did everything in her power to make sure that she protected him.

questions.text: Whose remains were discovered in the bomb shelter after Greenlee and Zack were rescued?
questions.explanation:
John Remington.

	John Remington had worked with Jessie Hubbard on the Pine Valley Police Department and had briefly dated Angie after Jessie's supposed death.  It was discovered that the bones found in the bomb shelter were his and that he had been murdered.

questions.text: Who did Papel kidnap in order to get information out of Jessie?
questions.correct: Frankie and Colby & Colby and Frankie
questions.explanation:
Frankie and Colby & Colby and Frankie.

	Colby happened to be in the wrong place at the wrong time when Papel and his men captured Frankie.  Tad and Jessie went together to rescue them when a round of gun fire broke out and an undercover FBI agent was killed.   Robert Gardner, who was Papel, convinced Jessie and Tad that he had been working undercover on this case for years.  Robert had come back to town to supposedly form a relationship with Tad Martin, his nephew.  What he really was looking for were rare diamonds that had been stolen from him over 20 years ago.

questions.text: What type of stuffed animal was the rare diamond hidden in?
questions.explanation:
elephant.

	Papel had hidden the diamond in a stuffed animal that belonged to Frankie Hubbard when he was 5 years old.  After Jessie's grave was dug up they found an elephant that had been torn apart, leading them to believe that something was hidden inside.  Angie told Jessie and Tad that she had given the original elephant out of his casket at the funeral and placed in another elephant and then gave the elephant away to charity.

questions.text: What city had Cassandra, Angie's daughter with Jacob, been living in before she came to Pine Valley?
questions.explanation:
Paris, France.

	Cassandra was living with her father and going to school in Paris.  She was looking into attending Pine Valley University in the fall and chose to move back to be closer to her mother and brother.  That is all for this quiz on "All My Children", I hope that you liked it.
